data.name: Aliens After Ava
data.detailed_description:
The aliens are here...

You are Ava, a survivor out in the wild in the midst of an alien invasion. Fight back as you dodge, jump, roll, and use advanced technology to navigate your escape across terrain and extraterrestrial foes!

Features

  • Procedural generated obstacles and foes!
  • 3 levels with their own unique boss battle
  • 4 unique plutonium based armaments
  • Hand drawn animation and art style

Coming Soon

  • Infinite run mode
  • Boss marathon mode
  • Practice mode
  • Additional zones and armaments
  • Backpack menu featuring armament upgrades and selection, alien info, and "lost and found" items

data.short_description: You are Ava, a survivor out in the wild in the midst of an alien invasion. Fight back as you dodge, jump, roll, and use advanced technology to navigate your escape across terrain and extraterrestrial foes!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 11.6 (Big Sur)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains animated scenes of blasting enemy aliens, stabbing them, and getting slashed by aliens. Images of blood are only shown around the player camera view when they get hurt.
